body:
Looked around a bit, didn't find a topic on this so...

  As We all know, minecraft attracts people of all ages and cultures, (I'm actually a -111.3 year old ladybug from Jupiter) so you never really know who the other players are. I think what a person plays says alot about them, so I decided this would be a good way to get inside your heads without asking for personal info. (Heh, see this FBI? I'm good enough for you!) 

Anyways, I've spent approximately half of my life playing did meiers civilization 5, but i also like the survival genre, and i enjoy a first  person shooter now and then. So to sum it up, what other games do you guys play?

title: What other types of game do you play?

replies.body: That board game is pretty fun. :D
replies.body_tagged: That board game is pretty fun. :D

replies.body: I used to play LoL but I don't exactly play any other games. I occasionally play Runescape: Old School, osu! and Audiosurf.
replies.body_tagged: I used to play LoL but I don't exactly play any other games. I occasionally play Runescape: Old School, osu! and Audiosurf.

replies.body: League of Legends, CS:GO, GTA San Andreas, and occasionally Osu.
